error: CRITICAL FAILURE: Order bump popup did NOT appear when clicking $19 button. Page redirected directly to SimpleSwap instead of showing the popup first.

details.flow: Size M was successfully selected, then $19 PRE-ORDER button was clicked, but instead of showing order bump popup, page immediately redirected to SimpleSwap exchange page.
details.expected: After clicking $19 button, order bump popup (#orderBumpPopup) should appear with upsell offer, then redirect to SimpleSwap only after user declines.
details.actual: No popup appeared. Direct redirect to SimpleSwap occurred.
details.impact: Users cannot see or accept the order bump upsell offer. Revenue opportunity lost.
